alert.note: Alert for Jackson Hole; Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; South Lincoln County; Star Valley; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains; Upper Green River Basin; Upper Green River Basin Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 26 at 1:51PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT TETON AND LINCOLN COUNTIES... A snow squall accompanied by winds reaching 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. At 148 PM MST, a snow squall was along a line extending from 12 miles southeast of Teton Idaho to near Victor Idaho to Palisades Reservoir to 8 miles northeast of Georgetown Idaho and moving east at 35 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Jackson, Afton, Moose, Alpine, Cokeville, Alta, Thayne, southern Palisades Reservoir, Star Valley Ranch, Wilson, Hoback, Rafter J Ranch, Teton Village, Smoot, Turnerville, Grover, Kelly, Bondurant, Merna and Moran Bay. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&

area.areaDesc: Jackson Hole; Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; South Lincoln County; Star Valley; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains; Upper Green River Basin; Upper Green River Basin Foothills
